casebody.data:
Otto YOUNG, Respondent
v.
PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Petitioner No. 455 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 2, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 2nd day of January, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:

May the Board of Probation and Parole retroactively revoke previously-awarded credit for time served while an individual is at liberty on parole pursuant to 61 Pa.C.S. § 6138(a)?
